name: Nested
description: Explore a world through subdirectories.

name: One Week at Freddy's
description: One Week at Freddy's is a joke fnaf fangame based on Five nights at Freddy's 2 + Doom II by mrbenio.

name: P.O.W.: Prisoners of War
description: Sin descripción

name: Ikari III: The Rescue
description: Sin descripción

name: Ikari III: The Rescue
description: Sin descripción

name: Ikari III: The Rescue
description: Sin descripción

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Speed and Style Pack
description: The recipe for success? A mix of speed and style. Exactly what you will find in the amazing Speed and Style Pack: 2016 Ford GT Race, Audi R8 LMS, Corvette C8.R and Nissan GT-R R35 Liberty Walk Silhouette Works 35GT-RR are the 4 extraordinary cars waiting for you!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Fast X Pack
description: The HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED 2 - Fast X Pack is made for those who live for speed. Featuring unstoppable cars like the El Camino, Alfa Romeo Giulia Sprint GTA, BMW M5 and the Datsun 240Z, you'll go from 0 to 60 in an instant.

name: Gun Boat Duck Hunt
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Mystic Zone
description: You decided to read one ancient book, open it and... In one second you wiil be transfeered inside the Book's World. There after nuclear war in the six states become chaos and bloody wars ruled by Saint King.

name: Dead Outbreak
description: Sin descripción

name: L'Agonie Finale
description: L'Agonie Finale is a single-level PWAD for Doom II that was released in February 2018. It constitutes the bonus level to wrap up the French 3 heures d'agonie trilogy and is compiled of seven speedmaps designed by prominent contributors to the series: William Huber, Jean Bon (Jambon), Franck Livolant (franckFRAG), Roofi, JC Dorne, Arnaud Florian (Oxyde), and Maxime Bisiaux (Datacore). It uses the music track "Monuments of Treason" by Maxime Tondreau (Psychedelic Eyeball).

name: To Fight
description: This map is the third and final entry in Eternal's 2x2 series, following the previous month's Eclipse and Nightomb. Once again, it features only two textures and two flats used for the entirety of the map, but unlike its predecessors, it is a slaughter map, more in the vein of Eternal's previous maps, Generator of Evil and Belial's Bad Brain.

name: Cheogsh 2
description: Cheogsh 2 is Doom II episode created by Shadowman and Guest that was released on November 19, 2009. A sequel to 2007's Cheogsh, it contains seven maps and requires the GZDoom source port to play. Much like its predecessor, Cheogsh 2 has a gothic theme and is largely set in a series of demonic towns and fortresses, containing many advanced effects and, new graphics and new custom enemies.

name: Zones of Fear
description: Zones of Fear is a megawad for Doom II and Boom compatible source ports, created by several members of the Czech community from the website Liquid Doom.

name: 400 Minutes of /vr/
description: 400 Minutes of /vr/ is a 37-map community megawad for Doom II designed for Boom-compatible source ports by various members of 4chan's retro videogames board, led by MacGuffin and released on the Doomworld forums on May 10, 2022. It is a restriction-based project inspired by the previous 100, 200, and 300 Minutes of /vr/ projects. Mappers were limited to creating maps within 400 minutes of development time, including playtesting. A small number of maps were created in more than 400 minutes, with their creators being allowed extra time for various reasons.

name: 300 Minutes of /vr/
description: A megawad compilation of maps made by /vr/ users. Participants were asked to make a map in 300 minutes, with an initial two-week deadline period for submission. There was no particular theme beyond vanilla compatibility / no custom textures.

name: Behemoth
description: A moderately large map featuring a hellish fortification with progressively more difficult fights, especially in the secret areas. It was originally created for Nova III but was decided to release standalone instead.

name: Cipher
description: Cipher is a mostly-orange, industrial themed mapset that uses the (now not-so) brand new OTEX texture pack. This wad features highly modern gameplay influenced by mappers such as Ribbiks, Skillsaw, Darkwave0000, Mechadon etc etc etc and runs on Boom format/complevel 9.

name: Yart
description: A single simple techbase map.

name: Da Will
description: A first wad from B0S (Best Of Survivors) clan. The B0S clan has sent you on the task to find out what happened to "Object 33", with which the contact has been lost. It is located in remote district of the Central America so be prepared for a tough way.

name: 5 Years
description: A small megawad consists of 3 maps in Limit Removing format. The Hell invades in our reality, so, get ready your shotgun and kill them all.

name: Downhell
description: Downhell is a single-level PWAD for Doom II, meant for limit-removing ports that was released on June 14, 2009 by Shadowman. It uses the music track "The Wind" by Mark Klem. It is set in a vast underground demonic fortress built exclusively with vanilla textures.

name: Grid 32
description: MegaWad is consisting of 6 levels, which were built in "grid 32". This map editor grid was used while making all of these levels. All vertexes lay on knots of a grid 32, and this rule does not extend on things.There is no general style, each map expresses individual style of it`s author.

name: Hellfire
description: 15 new levels in two styles - City and Hell.

name: Hellfire 2
description: Hellfire 2 is a seven-level PWAD for Doom II, created by Shadowman. It is the sequel to 2006's Hellfire, and contains a similar premise with maps being split between city and Hell level

name: Hellfire: Reborn
description: Hellfire: Reborn is a seven-level PWAD for Doom II and limit removing source ports, created by Shadowman and released on December 4, 2011. This mapset is a partial remake of the first set of maps from Shadowman's 2006 Hellfire, with layouts done from scratch but still closely following the originals, albeit without any of the Hell levels. It has cosmetic graphic replacements for the zombieman and for the Wolfenstein SS which is turned into a female marine zombie.

name: Kobal
description: One map in techno-gothic style

name: Kobal 2
description: Kobal 2 is a two-level PWAD for Doom II, released on June 14, 2009. It was created by Shadowman as a sequel to 2007's Kobal, and features a similar gothic aesthetic on the first map, with many custom graphics and edited sprites to reinforce its setting, whereas the second map is set in a techbase and associated sewer system.

name: Object "32"
description:
Object "32" is a single-level PWAD for Doom II, meant for limit-removing ports that was released on December 13, 2008 by Lainos. It uses a music track from Gears of War.

A difficult and dark techbase overtaken and altered by the forces of Hell, Object "32" was originally meant to be part of the Grid 32 community project, but ended up being released standalone

name: Pieklo
description: A small wad consists of 2 maps. The maps originally have been constructed in limit- removing format, but there is Boom's action of sky transfer on map 02. You start in a small hotel. An aliens from Pekel world invades in our reallity, so, get ready your weapon and show them kuzma's mother!

name: Speed Master
description:
Megawad, based on the results of three speedmapping contests, held on , with next themes:

1. Industrial 2. Ancient city 3. Free disigned style, but there was limit of 3-colours of textures/floors on map

All maps were built in limit of 4 hours

name: Whitemare
description: Megawad, based on "winter" theme from Russian Doom Community. The demons have decided to ruin the winter's fun of Christmas and New Year's celebrations to people, so your task is prove those stupid bastards wrong.

name: Whitemare 2
description: Megawad, based on the results of a four speedmapping contests, held on , with such themes, as winter, thaw, precipices, and ancient civilizations. Maps were finalized some time later (some - very significantly), and several maps were built from scratch. This megawad tells us the fate of the Marine, who was going to celebrate the New Year. Suddenly, however, the monsters changed seasons' offset, and as a result - they stole the winter. We have to go through the mountains, castles and underground crypts, visit the flooded city, a lonely island and even visit the hell's edge before it will be possible to restore the normal course of the seasons. But monsters were prepared for that as well - and with the return of winter, they prepared some unpleasant surprises...

name: Inflation Bay
description: nflation Bay is a PWAD for Doom II, originally containing one level and first released on November 20, 2008. It was created by Shadowman, with an updated release following on July 22, 2010, containing a second map built in collaboration with Lainos. The levelset features themes similar to the Hellfire series, with the first map being set on a city street and the second one in and around an asylum. The WAD comes with cosmetic replacements for the Wolfenstein SS, which is turned into the cultist from Blood.

name: Pi2
description: A little map in techno-style with some elements of Kobal-style.

name: Yuggot
description: A techno-style WAD - UAC base on a far planet Yuggot.

name: A Megawad in Two Weeks
description: DOOM: A Megawad in Two Weeks is a 16-level megawad for Doom II and the ZDoom source port, created by members of the Doomworld community, led by Alexis Aiello (Vegeta). As the name implies, this project was built over the course of two weeks, and includes three new boss enemies via DECORATE – despite this though, the WAD otherwise follows the classic Doom gameplay formula.

name: The Shape of Happiness
description:
How many days has it been...
Since seeing another human?

Since having grandma's home-made baked potatoes?

A human named Cassie is travelling on the road one fateful day, when an accident sends her into a world vastly different from hers.

name: Digital Monster X
description: Digital Monster X is a brand new Digital Monster Virtual Pet which is focusing on X-Antibody Digimon. Several mechanics from the Digimon Pendulum X series also make a return, such as the XAI System.

name: Digital Monster X Ver.2
description: Digital Monster X Ver.2 is a Digital Monster Virtual Pet which is focusing on X-Antibody Digimon. Several mechanics from the Digimon Pendulum X series also make a return, such as the XAI System.

name: Johou Battle
description: Johou Battle is a bullet hell shoot 'em up game putting you in the shoes of Jotaro Kujo, the legendary fighter of Jojo's Bizarre Adventure fame or Ichirin Kumoi, a fighting spirit from Touhou Project, and pits you against the other! Take on a barrage of attacks based on those seen in Jojo's Bizarre Adventure: Stardust Crusaders and Touhou Project: Hopeless Masquerade in this challenging yet loving tribute to the two franchises!

name: Recruta Zero
description: Help Maçonaro find his way to the Hague tribunal. A disastrous government full of chloroquine and Viagra with a climate of famine and genocide. Recruta Zero encourages hatred in the population, leaving the country full of cracks.

name: Crusades
description: Crusades: An Unholy War is a nine-level Ultimate Doom PWAD in episode four style made by Richard Wiles. It replaces maps E4M1-E4M9.

name: The Day of Chains
description: E2-themed map, made as a present for Chaingunner's birthday.

name: Bloodrust
description: 11 Maps for Doom 2, all 'oldschool' in style and detail, and fairly short

name: Congestion Control
description: Congestion Control is a single-level PWAD for Doom II. It was designed by Karthik Abhiram and uses the music track "Popcorn Dance Mix" by Davie M. Karlsson, as well as title music track "Role Model" by Eminem and intermission music track "MMMenu" from Rise of the Triad by Lee Jackson

name: The Call of Ktulu
description: A marble castle and the surrounding caves and mountains. The name comes from the music, "The Call of Ktulu" by Metallica.

name: Castle Nevermore
description: Castle Nevermore is a single-level PWAD for Doom II, designed by Björn Ostmann (Vader) and released in June 2004. The map is themed on a gothic castle, with a detailed design that emphasizes layout and atmosphere. It combines small exterior areas, such as courtyards and gardens, with the deep and complex architecture of the castle.

name: Atomic Tomb
description: A level for Ultimate Doom + a port that will up the vis-plane limit and is compatible with boom. Shortly after Deimos vanished, the hellspawn appeared on Mars and Earth. Blah Blah Blah, you are a private UAC marine stationed on Mars, and your buddies are gone. Grab your shotgun and take some of the uglies out!

name: Congestion Control 2
description: Like it's predecessor, "Congestion Control", this map, "Congestion Control 2" is a fast-paced and fun Doom II level. It also features a unique visual style (different from the first one).

name: Remains
description: 2 maps using textures from a cancelled megawad.

name: Dark Fate
description: Dark Fate is a fast paced single player level for Doom II, inspired by the style of the original Doom's third episode, "Inferno".

name: The Hazard Variation
description: This is a map that was created in 2003 as "E4M1: First Gate" for the project "The Ninth Gate". However, as that project remained incomplete, this map was never released. Now that the maps from the project are being released individually, you can now play what would have opened that episode, retitled as "The Hazard Variation"!

name: Outbreak of Evil
description: Regular replacement of the first episode. Levels were released back in 2013, but were reworked in 2017-2019

name: My Brother; The Parasite
description: A story about a corpse, a complicated sibling relationship, and the things we forget. Made in Twine. Written, coded, and illustrated in three weeks for the Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Diet 32in24
description: Diet 32in24 is a special edition of the 32in24 series, which took place on 21 October, 2007, shortly after the fifth session. It is called Diet 32in24 as it actually only features 16 maps, which are designed for single player. Development of this WAD took the same approach as 32in24-5, with mappers creating their entire layout (plus thing placement) within 24 hours, and then the maps would be passed on to a second mapper who would detail the maps using a texture WAD compiled by Sarah Mancuso (esselfortium). Each map also contains at least two billboards, which feature humorous adverts that mostly relate to Doom and its community, or other games of the era. In total, the WAD contains 37 billboards.

name: Decade
description: Decade is a map designed by Russell Pearson and released in 2004. It requires a ZDoom-compatible port. It uses the music track "Sinister" by Robert Prince. The level was constructed as a homage to celebrate that 2004 was Doom's tenth year. It is a "new school" map (using detailed architecture, ACS and other port features) constructed to be evocative of iconic areas from both Doom and Doom II.

name: Demonized
description: DemoniZed is a two-level PWAD for Doom II and Boom compatible source ports. It was created by Pedro Francisco Puicón (NokturnuS) and released in November 1998. The PWAD was among the first to experiment with TeamTNT's then-new Boom engine, which had been released only a month before, and thus experimented with many new visual and level design effects that were not previously seen in the community.

name: Doomtown
description: 3 single player levels

name: Diabolos
description: Diabolos = Greek word for the devil. This level will test your awareness and of course, pit you to survive in many different and confusing 3 Dimensional environments. As you explore the complex of chambers and sewers, you'll find that areas are organized in an intelligent composition. when you see a bloodfall, you can track it to its source.

name: Doomsday
description: Doomsday is a single-level PWAD for Doom that was designed by David Rotramel and Chris Berger. It was released on December 1, 1995. It is a large level with some custom textures, starting off as a military base and power plant before featuring more Hellish location such as a library and marble halls.

name: Odyssey
description: Odyssey.Wad is a compilation of 5 levels of the Ancient Series over the course of a month as individual episodes Each level is set in a different time period or locale. The concept being that the UAC agent (you) are travelling thru time to stop the influx of those friendly neighborhood beasties. The beasties have gotten their claws on some kind of time travel device.....You must go back to the 5 different time zones and eliminate the threat to history otherwise the distortion ripples would be so terrible, that life as we know it today would cease to exist.

name: Pazuzu
description: This single mission takes you to a demonic series of underhalls and temples to the evil devil Pazuzu. The entire complex is guarded by some of your most feverish nightmares... Stay alert and work your way thru this unearthly place in search of the three ancient skulls of mystic held within the complex..... retrieve them and escape... hopefully with all of your limbs still attached!

name: Torment
description: Torment is a Doom II episode replacement mod of six levels including original music, created by Shamus Young in 1995.

name: Tunnel Run
description: Dark astmospheric level, confined tunnels and large storage areas.

name: Parasite Flower
description:
A short disturbing horror game where you're playing as Ari Yeong, she is re-living the same day over and over again . With each loop the world around her get's darker and more dangerous.

Get her to school safely.

name: Half-Life 1: Ray Traced
description: “Half-Life 1: Ray Traced integrates the real-time path tracing into the original Half-Life (1998),” according to its creator, sultim_t. “With the hardware accelerated ray tracing, it is possible to calculate global illumination, reflections, refractions, soft shadows and other visual effects with interactive framerates."

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 Co-op
description: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 Co-op is a rom hack for Sonic the Hedgehog 2 which adds in co-op multiplayer into the game.

name: E1 Contest
description: E1 Contest is a 2001 megawad. It is a compilation of 15 levels in the style of the Knee-Deep in the Dead episode by multiple authors, one map per author. It was the fruit of a contest announced by the extinct website Doom Center during the E1 Week which took place in the first seven days of July 2001. John Romero was sent these levels and he would examine and rate them in order to proclaim four winners. The author of the top rated level received as prize a box of The Ultimate Doom with all items signed by John Romero.

name: Extremal Doom
description: Extremal Doom is a Doom megawad by Russian level designer Mikle Ilyin that was initially released in January 2003. It features three episodes, as well as some texture and sprite replacements, several of which have been taken from Hexen.

name: Galaxia
description: Galaxia is a PWAD created by Pavel Hodek. It is notable for an extensive storyline (presented in a separate file, story.txt) which serves as the basis of the WAD's design and progression, in an era when most designers did not care about story or theme. It also features a few new sound effects and two replacement music tracks.

name: Sonic Adventure DX: Multiplayer Mod
description: A mod for Sonic Adventure DX which adds split screen multiplayer to the game.

name: Hedrox
description: HeDRoX is a single-level PWAD for Doom II and the ZDoom source port. It was designed by the Argentine mapper Rodrigo Acevedo (ElRodo) and uses the music track "Plasma" from Duke Nukem 3D. A compact techbase showcasing highly detailed and unusual architecture, A really short but very intense single player map.

name: Hedrox 2
description: The sequel to Hedrox, this time bigger and more challenging.

name: Testing Facility
description: Esselmap I: Testing Facility is a single-level PWAD for Doom II using a limit removing source port. It was designed by Sarah Mancuso (esselfortium) and uses the music track "Ordinary Story" by In Flames

name: The Farside of Titan
description: Given your success with the UAC mining base and the Anomaly investigation, it was inevitable that you get picked for this foray into the Titan Farside Research Base. Oh well. Rumours have it that some prototypes of alien technology are being tested here. Please investigate and report.

name: Satan's Pepper
description:
Interactive horror fiction story, originally made for Kajam 2022.

Inspired by Baphometkun's and Andy Land's art styles.

name: Pimp My Ride Street Racing
description: Pimp my Ride: Street Racing was the second game related to the automotive show.

name: Gorilla Smash City Attack Game
description:
Escape with your gorilla friends from the most dangerous jails of all times!

Are you ready to explore the grand city jail and execute your escaping plan with the help of your prison surviving tactics while playing Gorilla Escape City Jail Survival game! Some Police officer catches you and your friend from the jungle with the help of their gorilla catching strategy. Missions are simple but interesting gameplay and it’s your duty to save your mate, friends from a prison guard.

Gorilla prison break is specially designed for all jailbreak game lovers and gorilla RPG game fans. Use your surviving skills and break the prison cage. Beat the security guards and unlock your friends with the help of master key which you got from a security officer. Use security baton to face the police officer and move like a shadow in the grand city prison.

name: Insanity's Edge
description: You are Sergeant Shaun Rumsey, a marine on a UAC base on earth that was recently attack by the forces of hell, after finding a large hell portal in the mines. Marines fought bravley, but were outnumberded and slaughtered. As far as you know, you are the only one left on this base, and it is amazing you are still alive. Maybe you have better skills than you first thought. You see a shotgun in front of you, and hope that no demons will come teleporting in once you pick it up.

name: Insertion
description: Insertion is an eleven-level PWAD for Doom II. It was created by David Shaw, Stephen Watson, Thomas Evans and Adam Williamson. Most of the authors had previously worked on either the first or second Memento Mori, or Requiem, and the gameplay and level design found here is similar in style to those, albeit with fewer maps.

name: The Island
description: The Island is a single-level PWAD for Doom II. It is a very large level set on a volcanic island, featuring lakes, forests and a large UAC base in the centre, as well as several visual and sound effects to enhance the ambience. Several new DECORATE monsters are also included, many from the then-new Monster Resource WAD. The author cited Far Cry as the main inspiration when designing this level

name: The Island 2
description: The Island 2 is a single-level PWAD for Doom II. A sequel to farlowj's previous map, The Island, it once again features a similar setting as before, with large outdoor coastal areas and forested landscapes, but this time with a greater emphasis on indoor locations, including a cave system and a large UAC underground complex.

name: Inferno
description: Inferno (not to be confused with Doom's original third episode) is a nine-level episode replacement designed by Christopher Lutz and released in March 1998. The mapset is themed after Doom episode Inferno, replacing all levels with new ones designed around the Hell map visual style.

name: The Interdiction Zone
description: You've been dropped in the maintenance area of enemy headquarters. You've got to find your way out, cross the interdiction zone, and destroy enemy HQ by locating and pressing the well guarded security destruct switch.

name: Internal Reaches 2
description: Internal Reaches 2 is a single-level PWAD for Doom II that came out in 2003. It was designed by Samuel Villarreal (Kaiser) and is also known as Kaiser 1.

name: Internal Reaches 4
description: Internal Reaches 4 is a single-level PWAD for Doom II that was released in 2004. It was designed by Samuel Villarreal (Kaiser) and is also known as Kaiser 8.

name: Istanbul
description: Four levels beginning in the early dawn in an Arabian/Greco- Roman style.

name: Habblet
description: Habblet is an unofficial version of the popular virtual world Habbo, specifically made for Brazilian players. It offers all the VIP and HC services, along with ample coins to purchase a wide array of items and experiences you want. In this dynamic and engaging environment, players can create personalized avatars, design and decorate their virtual spaces, and connect with friends from across Brazil. From engaging in various activities to joining themed events and exploring countless interactive room.

name: My Soul Trapped in a WIN98 PC
description: My Soul Trapped in a WIN98 PC (ST98.WAD) is a January 2015 techbase map designed for Boom-compatible source ports by Lucas Hernandez (Lukasxd). Most of the level's textures are graphics from Windows 98 and 1990s Internet programs, and it uses the music track "Earthlight" from the game Einhänder.

name: Nostromo's Run
description: Nostromo's Run takes place in an isolated station aboard some alien planet. The base was used for fighter training and mutant entertainment and features a large arena. Humans were being brought to this pleasure ground for the mutants amusement.

name: Oceanside
description: Oceanside is a three-map Doom II WAD for limit removing source ports created by Michael Jan Krizik (valkiriforce), which he has stated is one of his most personal projects. It is inspired by nostalgic memories of his hometown of Oceanside, California and features several recreations of real-life locations, including his childhood home.

name: Orange is True Love
description: Orange is True Love is a three-level Doom II PWAD for Boom-compatible source ports. A precursor to the Wormwood series, it represents the first in a series of Halloween-themed collaborations between Zachary Stephens (Ribbiks) and Grain of Salt and was released on October 31, 2018. The WAD features a prominent orange color theme and consists of two short but challenging opening maps and a more extensive, medium-length finale.

name: The Outer Darkness
description: This map is heavily inspired by Episode 4 of The Ultimate Doom, especially E4M1 and E4M6. It was originally made for a project called The Ninth Gate that never saw the light of day.

name: Pax
description: Pax is a single-level PWAD for Doom II and a Boom-compatible source port. It was released by Ty Halderman in 1999 and uses an unnamed music track by Peter Cowderoy.

name: Pinnacle of Darkness
description: Large hell/gothic themed map for GZDoom.

name: Short 'n Quick
description: this is a tech-styled map taking place in a warehouse

name: Short 'n Quick 2
description: It looks to be inspired by Christian Hansen's 'Flay the Obscene 3', but it's actually based on the look planned for 'The Anomaly: Part III. The layout of the map is done in such a way that you can actually go anywhere you want to and chose a route that you feel best. Some routes make the level more hard and some routes make it easier.

name: Reanimated
description: Two levels set in a nukage base. The idea was to make two small speedmaps using some Linkin Park MIDIs that we downloaded as the music.

name: Ja-in
description:
This game is a horror game.
Contains threatening and cruel depictions.
It also contains vulgar and disrespectful expressions.

name: Polygon Base
description: A totally non-linear level, other than needing all three keys to exit, you're free to go anywhere you want. Play on HMP for a Doom-like experience, UV adds the Doom 2 monsters, NTR is real easy. Clear all otherworldly mutants, secure the base, and live to tell another tale.

name: Post
description: Post is a Doom II episode replacement mod of eleven levels, created by Tony Sideris in 1996. It was a sequel to his Doom episode replacement Debut from earlier in 1996.

name: RRWard02
description: RRWard02 is a single-level PWAD designed by Richard R. Ward and released in November 1994.

name: Ruma
description: A base around a brown canyon.

name: Run Buddy
description: Run Buddy, stylized as "run buddy", is a single map for Boom by Michael Krause released in April 1998. Its notability is in the large scale of its architecture and liberal use of open spaces, which contributed to slowdown issues due to reject inefficiencies. A "fast" version using RMB to calculate the reject was released in May 1998.

name: Sillouhettes of Phobos
description: Sillouhettes of Phobos (a misspelling of Silhouettes of Phobos) is an Ultimate Doom replacement mod of four levels, created by Michael Lundy and released in November 1995. It consists of four spacious levels, the first three replacing the respective maps from Knee-Deep in the Dead, and the last bonus map taking up the E4M1 slot.

name: Rose Guns Days: Season 1
description: Rose Guns Days: Season 1 is the first visual novel in the Rose Guns Days series, which consists of five chapters and covers the year 1947.

name: Liminal Gallery
description: Liminal Gallery is a small experimental project with unusual mechanics, with which you can turn pictures into reality. Explore the different rooms in the gallery looking for the door to the next level. The game is short and takes 10-15 minutes.

name: More Fun with The Wiggles
description: More Fun with The Wiggles is a CD-ROM game released in 2007 based on The Wiggles.

name: Skycity
description: Skycity uses new textures, graphics and new sounds for the weapons. The level is set in a sort of abandoned megastructure, similar to a large shopping mall made out of concrete and marble. Spiderwebs and noticeable signs can be found all around. The map design is complex and intricate, with several interconnected areas and pathways that the player can choose, which encourages exploration due to the non-linearity of the map, and all the hidden and secret spots that can be found. It is a very early example of a semi-realistic map trying to recreate an urban-like structure.

name: Slaughter Until Death
description: Slaughter Until Death is a PWAD for Doom which replaces all nine maps in The Shores of Hell, created by The Innocent Crew.

name: Skyewood
description: Play Doom outside in a forest, complete with angry trees, groovy mushrooms, exploding toads and a real dragon!

name: Threshold of Pain
description: Threshold of Pain is a ZDoom episode which attempts to recreate the look and feel of Midway's famous PSX conversion of Doom whilst maintaining the core elements of the PC versions and a level of difficulty PC players would expect.

name: Tantrum
description: Lots of different brick walls and corroded metal.

name: Tantrum 2
description: Sweet level with bricks and corroded metal as its main texture theme. Some wood and marble too.

name: Jouka no Monshou
description:
An Equilibrium fanfic visual novel by Urobuchi Gen.

The story of a duo of Grammaton Clerics, once a mentor and pupil, now partners.

name: Vanilla Sky
description: Vanilla Sky is set in an extremely large city, similarly to DooMknight's previous map Europe released in 2005. It uses vanilla textures in very creative ways, notably with the creation of vehicles through sector detail.

name: Yesterday's Nightmare
description: Surreal medieval themed map.

name: The Waterfront
description: The Waterfront (Wtrfront.Wad) is a level created by Scott F. Crank in May 1995. It is often considered the earliest level to deliberately exploit the ghost monster bug, which its text file calls the "arch-vile bug"

name: Zort 9
description: Really dark hellish brick caves sorta map.

name: A Dark Place
description:
A Dark Place is a 2018 meta-horror that puts the player in a surreal environment. Features great music and eerie areas to explore and solve puzzles in. Search for keys to open doors and progress through the game. Find all 4 music boxes to find your way to freedom. But there's one thing, don't let the c̬̪̜̰̹̬͚o̼̰̟̠ͅr͝ru͚͠p̣͖̱ț͕̰̻̯i̘͕̳o̖̬͢n̤ stop you from doing so.

This game is extremely intelligent and has the ability to break the fourth wall and act like a real computer nightmare. It will interact with the computer, recognize player actions, and crash the game on purpose to create new events throughout the game meaning the player have to restart the game if that happens and more. Please note that this game is 100% harmless in every way and is created for an amazing experience.

name: Avalon: The Druids
description:
Set in a fantasy medieval kingdom, players utilize their NFTs to explore a world of danger and mystery while competing for rare NFT rewards. The game is built around both active play-to-earn and passive own-to-earn economies.

Inspired by the legend of King Arthur and alternate history of Knights templar, this game challenges every player to undertake a thrilling adventure in their quest to ultimately claim their very own seat among the Knights of the Round Table. Along the way, players earn rewards (i.e. NFTs, in-game AVL tokens) by purchasing, renting, or securing resources as well as collaborating with NFT landowners to acquire and build in-game real estate.

name: Soren Game
description: Soren Game is a dropping puzzle game like Suika Game. You can play on web browser. Players can score points by sticking together puzzle pieces in the shape of Soviet Union countries. The same piece can be put together into different pieces. There's a limit to the container you can put pieces in, and if it overflows, it's game over.

name: Road Adventures USA
description: An edutainment game released by The Learning Company in 1999. Players must travel across America to various tourist destinations in a limited timespan with a limited budget while competing against AI opponents.

name: Moe Moe Daisensou Gendaiban
description: Sin descripción

name: My Rental Girlfriend Next
description:
As a shy high school student, dating isn’t exactly your thing. But luckily, you’ve been able to take advantage of a rental girlfriend service to at least enjoy artificial relationships. You seemed quite satisfied with the status quo and are especially fond of a certain girl named Sumire who you’ve taken on many dates.

One day, you happened to witness the Rental Girlfriend championship and are in awe of the beauty of contestants such as Celina. Your brought back out of your trance when a striking girl next to you begins talking to you. Her name is Jerry and she claims she will be the next Rental Girlfriend star.

It seems she thinks that it is some kind of simple modeling contest, so you decide to explain that it’s much more than that. However, instead of losing interest, you’ve only gotten her more invested and she demands you become her coach to become the next star!

name: Genius Bishoujo Romance Bundle
description: Make exciting decisions throughout the story to enjoy your very own unique experience! Choose from a selection of 3 of slice of life romance titles for you to enjoy as a bundle! Who will you choose to be your waifu?

name: Deltarune: Chapter 3
description: An upcoming chapter for Deltarune. It is set to release alongside chapter 4.

name: Deltarune: Chapter 4
description: An upcoming chapter for Deltarune. It is set to release alongside chapter 3.

name: Deltarune: Chapter 5
description: An upcoming chapter for Deltarune.

name: Deep Space Drifter
description: A text adventure game in which you play a deep space explorer, stranded on an abandoned space station, a victim of your own poor planning.

name: Girlscamp
description: Sin descripción

name: DeltaBeats
description: DeltaBeats is an independently produced touchscreen rhythm game designed as a spiritual successor to certain commercial rhythm games that are no longer playable.

name: Overload: First Strike
description: Community level pack that is a remake of Descent's (1994) campaign in Overload, including several balancing tweaks and a custom soundtrack.

name: Agent: Osoboe Zadanie
description: Sin descripción

name: Rose Guns Days: Season 2
description: Rose Guns Days: Season 2 is the second installment in the Rose Guns Days series, which consists of five chapters and covers the years 1947 and 1948.

name: Rose Guns Days: Season 3
description: Rose Guns Days: Season 3 is the third installment in the Rose Guns Days series, which consists of seven chapters and covers the years 1948 and 1949.

name: The Board AI
description:
Step into a realm of endless possibilities and creepy conversations with this cutting-edge ChatGPT spirit board experience.

The Board AI is designed to provide you with an immersive and interactive experience where you can feel real interactions with entities from the afterlife.

name: Rose Guns Days: Last Season
description: Rose Guns Days: Last Season is the fourth and final installment in the Rose Guns Days series, which consists of six chapters and covers the years 1949 and 1950.

name: Giga Pets Explorer
description: Giga Pets Explorer is a plug-and-play game released by Hasbro in 2006. Handheld pets could be zapped into the device to explore the 9 areas of Giga Island, collect items, and complete missions.

name: Rose Guns Days: The Best
description: Rose Guns Days The Best is a re-release of Rose Guns Days, which includes all content from Season 1 to Last Season and a special new scenario.

name: Innocence Or Money
description: Innocence Or Money tells the Story of Jennifer, who is an innocent girl from a little town named Greensdale, she has lived all her life there with her sister Jessica and her uncle. She also has a boyfriend called Mike. One of her dreams is to go to the big city so she will pack everything and take the journey of her life!

name: Night at Banban's
description: Play as a nightwatch looking over a kindegarten school known as BanBan's Kindergarten. Can you keep the mascots at bay and find out the truth?

name: Pac-Man
description: A fan made port of the original Namco game, a staple of 2000s-era gaming portals.

name: Out of Gas
description: Retro horror with PSX style graphics where you run out of gas.

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Free Update #2
description:
The second free update for Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed added the S.C.Y. County Courthouse map, the Possessor ghost type with 3 new ghosts, Trap Minions that can be placed in objects or on the ground and Dredges that can be summoned to help distract the Busters.

Alongside the general rebalancing and bug fixes it also added more customization options with new Gear Shells and cosmetics based on the Extreme Ghostbusters Cartoon series, makeup styles with numerous color options, shirt logos for compatible tops, gear tints and new Ghostbuster cosmetics including footwear, a skirt and kilt bottom.

name: Five Nights at SCP
description: Sin descripción

name: Bonzo: Escape from Olympus
description: Sin descripción

name: Brutalist Jam 2
description: Over three and a half weeks, mappers created maps loosely centered around the Brutalism architectural movement. From concrete hellscapes to brutal liminal voids, imaginations and creativity ran wild in this jam, and created some truly stunning experiences! Built in the gameplay mod Copper (included), the pack includes 30 levels lovingly crafted by mappers both new and veteran, many maps created by first time mappers.

name: Re:Mobilize Jam 1: Re:Collections
description: A jam held from August 1, 2023 to October 1, 2023, featuring 4 maps all making use of the Re:Mobilize mod and its signature movement-based mechanics!

name: Night at Banban's II
description: BanBan's Kindergarten follows you back to your home in the countryside. What will you do? The official sequel night's at BanBan'a Kindergarten!

name: Escape the City
description: Silva's first map

name: Bhop Pro
description: You can jump and bunny hop in fps mode with bhop pro. You can prove that you are really a bhop master with the scores and durations you will get. You must continuously turn right or left and synchronously jump at the same time to be able to do successful bunny hops. Bhop Pro is a portable mobile bhop style jumping game. You can get new rankings by doing parkour quests. If you can really do it, you will be a 'bhop pro'.

name: Over Ridden
description: Two spacious, medium sized base maps with a somewhat unusual theme and modified Grunts and Enforcers carrying SSG, NG, SNG, GL and RL.

name: Duke Nukem Quake
description: Small city themed level, a remake of the first level of Duke Nukem 3D + custom start map.

name: Never Trust a Zone Warden
description: 5-10 minutes of vibes and violence, give or take.

name: Ten Thousand Days in the Fire
description: Medium-sized runic-themed map, built for Copper

name: Castle Golgotha
description: Two medium sized Metal/Wizard maps and a start map.

name: The Temple of Nightmares
description: Medium-sized elder world map with medieval and wizard elements, classic vanilla id1 style.

name: The Warmest Body in the Room
description: Small dark semi-linear single-player map with minimalist brushwork and texturing. Map source is included.

name: JumpStart Adventure Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Free Update #3
description:
The third free update for Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed added the New Motion Club map, the Watcher ghost type with 3 new ghosts and tenure level 4 with some exclusive cosmetics.

Alongside the general rebalancing and bug fixes it also added more customization options with new Gear Shells and cosmetics from the 2016 Ghostbusters film, Scar options for face customization, new ghostbuster cosmetics with a summer theme and new tints to use on them.

name: Diorama
description: A comfy game about designing your own personal home.

name: Sanity Chase
description: Sanity Chase is a 2v5 asymmetrical competitive game. Here, you can enjoy our unique art style, engaging 2v5 gameplay, and the excitement of playing with friends. Welcome to the lost kingdom! Are you ready?

name: Uncover the Smoking Gun
description: "Uncover the Smoking Gun" places you in the heart of a thrilling urban investigation where true detective work awaits. As a seasoned detective, your primary challenge lies in real-time chat interactions with various suspects. This adventure-puzzle game excels in its dynamic dialogue system, where every conversation can shift the course of your investigation. Gathering clues and persuading suspects to unveil the truth requires sharp intuition and cunning strategy. The game also features compelling confession mechanics, demanding players to navigate conversations to extract vital admissions skillfully. "Uncover the Smoking Gun" combines an intricate narrative with immersive environments, promising a gaming experience that keeps you on the edge of your seat as you hunt down the truth.

name: Skibidi.io
description: Your goal is to eat, grow and evolve! As you grow and evolve, you will unlock special abilities and powers to help you in your quest for victory.

name: Beloved Beatrice
description: Beatrice has never liked the world she lived in, so she escapes into the realm of dreams in order to avoid it. What happens after she encounters a mysterious girl within her dream?

name: Panoptique
description:
A (very bad) interactive experience.

This game is part of the Ambient Mixtape 16, a collection of original curated works surrounding a central theme: "After Hours".

AM16 intends to showcase a diverse spectrum of independent developers and how their process interacts within shared constraints.Each developer was given the same First Person Camera Controller and the theme "After Hours", to form in to their own interactive work.

name: Touch Me2
description:
Created as part of of Ambient Mixtape 16: a collection of original curated works surrounding a central theme: "After Hours".

AM16 intends to showcase a diverse spectrum of independent developers and how their process interacts within shared constraints.
Each developer was given the same First Person Camera Controller and the theme "After Hours", to form in to their own interactive work.

name: I Have Been There Twice
description:
I have been there twice. Twice isn't enough, to be honest, but past the first time I have only been there in fragments, dreams and daydreams, and something half-assembled. The sum of an infinite series is finite, if each successive term diminishes. 1 + 1/2 + 1/4 + 1/8 + ... sums to two, no matter how many more times I see us walking through jioufen in the cool night, making our way back to the bus stop.

Created as part of of Ambient Mixtape 16: a collection of original curated works surrounding a central theme: "After Hours".

name: Xeta
description:
"The earth is dead." The lack of resources brought the end to the earth. Governments sent exploring troops to the universe to find new homes.
A troop – Columbus – was attacked while landing the planet called Z. The spacecraft crashed on the halfway up the mountain, and as the only survival, what you need to do is trying not to be killed by the enemies…

name: Graphsx
description: You turned on your monitor right now? It isn't giving to you a image? Maybe the pixels of your monitor is in to a journey; why you don't help them in this hard physics-based puzzle platform journey. Explore hundreds of challenges, become more and more sharper and find out more about a pixel journey.

name: Media Is Dead. You Are Alive.
description:
"Media Is Dead, You Are Alive" is a game about the frustration at the lack of awareness of how internet media is consumed. As the internet has permeated our lives, how we engage with media has changed. While we look outside of ourselves for answers, entertainment, and connection we must also be conscious of how that media shapes us. It's all too easy to lose oneself if you aren't careful.

Created as part of of Ambient Mixtape 16: a collection of original curated works surrounding a central theme: "After Hours".

name: Chess Quarto
description: Chess Quarto is a video game published in 1997 on Commodore 64 by Carl Bevington and Loadstar.

name: Call of Duty: World at War - Zombies II
description:
Call of Duty: World at War - Zombies II is the follow up to Call of Duty: World at War - Zombies. It is the same app as the original but instead comes with the map Shi No Numa instead of Nacht der Untoten, featuring new weapons and characters.

Nacht Der Untoten is downloadable through Call of Duty: World at War: Zombies II but buying this map would make the two apps the same.

name: Sea of Conquest
description: Command your ship, recruit pirates and rule the vast ocean!

name: Call of Duty: Roman Wars
description: Call of Duty: Roman Wars (referred to internally as Fireteam) is a scrapped Call of Duty game that was in development in 2008 by Vicarious Visions. Unlike other titles, the game would have been played from a top-down perspective rather than a first person one.

name: Sunrise Eiyuutan
description: Sunrise Eiyuutan is a Japanese battle RPG developed and published by Sunrise Interactive for the Sega Dreamcast on December 2, 1999.

name: Blamcon Shooting Gallery
description: This game is only properly experienced when using an Infrared Light Gun. Each consecutive hit gives you bonus points. You can reload as many times as you like but keep an eye on that ammo, 6 shots doesn't last!

name: Downstairs
description: Developed and published by Levienze Games, this game is a short story based horror and thriller game.

name: CapsuleMan
description: This is a cartoon style top view shooting game that supports single or local multiplayer gameplay, Players can use weapons with diverse styles to fight against a large number of monsters. It is also crucial to build together a variety of strange mechanisms and traps in advance.

name: 100 Tokyo Cats
description: Can you find 100 adorable cats hidden in Tokyo, Japan? Test your attention in this cozy charming hand-drawn hidden object game. 100 Tokyo Cats are waiting for you in the BEST hidden objects game! ️‍ Can you find them all? ️‍

name: Sybaritic Extravaganza
description: Sybaritic Extravaganza is an RPG game where you have to help the protagonists fulfill the last wish of Caravella king and awaken the peoples for the last war with the monsters.

name: Necromorphosis
description: In this unliving hell, become the bullet heaven. Gather the bones of fallen foes and morph into the ultimate skeleton to claim your throne of skulls as King of the Undead, if you can survive the Necromorphosis.

name: Mystery Trackers: Darkwater Bay - Collector's Edition
description:
Elephant Games presents the latest exhilarating installment of the Mystery Trackers series!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

The Collector's Editions includes:
• Dive deeper and explore aquatic lore in the bonus game!
• Find hidden fish, morphing objects, and restore the missing puzzle pieces.
• If you need a helping hand, consult the comprehensive strategy guide.
• Enjoy unlocking a myriad of fun achievements.
• Includes a secret room, concept art, wallpapers, soundtrack, and more!

name: FireBall 2
description: Fireball 2 is an elegant and satisfying arcade-survival game about dodging swarms and triggering bombs. Take control of your fireball and weave through the massive flood of enemies. Lure the flood towards bombs and trigger them, either directly or indirectly, to take out as many enemies as possible.

name: Red Impact
description: Defend entire planets against hostile invaders in this full 3D tower defense game. Manage resources and space while constructing weapons, defenses, and structures to withstand the destructive onslaught across multiple planets.

name: Five Day Detective
description: The Five Day Detective is a point n click whodunnit featuring multiple cases and a twisted sense of humour.

name: Tram Simulator Urban Transit
description: Welcome to Tram Simulator Urban Transit - get on aboard! In this game, you take on the role of a tram driver and manager. Drive 6 unique tram models. Transport passengers and drive them to the numerous stops. Plan your own routes, manage your timetables, and expand your tram network.

name: ManaSoul
description: ManaSoul is a 2D Pixel Art MORPG where you create and play as your own unique Mage in a world of magic. Play solo or with friends and take on challenges, solve puzzles, and explore the beautiful hand crafted open world.

name: Shape Tunnel
description: Welcome to Shape Tunnel: A Dimensional Challenge! Prepare for a mind-bending journey through twisting tunnels and geometric puzzles. Match your shape to the ever-changing tunnel by deftly rotating the shapes. Precision and quick thinking are your allies. Conquer this challenge!

name: Scary School Simulator 2
description: Escape from horror anime ghost story in your school's classroom!

name: Billiard of Chaos
description: Billiard of Chaos is a casual indie game, where your goal is to shoot the cue ball and keep hitting the red and color balls into the pockets. No need to master complex skills, all you need to do is keep shooting, shooting, and enjoy watching those red balls shatter.

name: Code Has Price
description: Buy Commands. Make a program. Collect more coins. Repeat.

name: Spookermarket
description: A survival horror that takes place in a supermarket. Collect all the items on your shopping list and make it out alive.

name: Cranky Chibi Cthulhu
description: An 8-bit style vertical SHMUP (very loosely) based on the writings of H.P. Lovecraft.

name: Tora's Garden
description: Catch fish, collect bugs, find furniture and help the locals as you create your sanctuary on a dying world.

name: Lumenile: Found Footage
description: A phycological found footage horror game

name: Kingdom, Dungeon, and Hero
description: You lead one of many kingdoms. Form armies, negotiate, trade or conquer other kingdoms. Hire heroes to explore dungeons, lead armies, govern, or go on missions. Research to increase your power. Construct buildings to improve your kingdom. Easy to learn, difficult to master.

name: Chasing Chickens
description: CHASING CHICKENS is where Quake's adrenaline meets Pac-Man's wit. Dive into 3D chaos with old-school charm: exploding beachballs, an army of killer chickens, floating cows, all in a hedge maze. Armed with a high-powered grenade launcher, it's a wild race. Outsmart, outrun, outplay. Ready, soldier?

name: Pixel Gun Master
description: Pixel Gunmaster is a roguelike shooter action game about a protagonist who is turned into a demon and goes on a journey to undo his wish. Will you be able to defeat powerful bosses and return to human form?

name: Doodle Adventure of Chameleon
description: Chameleon is a side-scrolling platformer with a hand-drawn doodle style. In this world of doodles, you will play as a chameleon created by a young boy's imagination. With the whimsical and imaginative adventures the young boy envisions, the charming chameleon embarks on thrilling adventures!

name: Salmon Man
description: Salmon Man is not a game; it's an experience, a test, a gift... to be sent to a certain kind of person, the one you hate from the deepest part of your soul.

name: Descent of the Hunted
description: You are a monster. You’re fresh on the trail of new prey, an isolated wretch vulnerable to your influence. But how will you stalk her? A long pursuit? A slow, parasitic feeding? A devastating ambush? In this psychological horror VN, you determine the manifestation of the beast under your control.

name: Dodolly Tales
description: Take command of unique dolls with a dual personality and confront your mischievous creator.Quickly level up at every stage, unlocking a plethora of thrilling abilities that will empower you to overcome the odds and be able to free your sisters.

name: ICBM: Escalation
description: ICBM: Escalation is a real time strategy game of global warfare and nuclear mass destruction. Issue orders to entire armies and wield the most powerful weapons to ever exist to eradicate your enemies and secure global supremacy.

name: Gravitorium
description: Harness the power of gravity to maneuver through challenging precision platforming and puzzle levels in this fun and kinetic 2D platformer!

name: Alone and Dangerous
description: Alone and Dangerous is a 3D action shooter in the setting of a zombie apocalypse. Controlling an armed soldier, you confront the constantly arriving forces of zombies. Collect experience points, upgrade your weapon, and continue on!

name: Standalone: Synergy
description: Standalone: Synergy, the ultimate CCG deck builder with rogue-lite elements. Immerse yourself in an epic campaign, with a gripping voice-over narrative, embark on thrilling adventures in procedural dungeons, unleash your strategic prowess in intense player versus player combat within the Arena!

name: Baugarten
description: Baugarten seamlessly blends empire building with STEM. Opt to use math and science for resource optimization or focus solely on empire expansion. A single dynamic experience where STEM is always integrated, but you decide its role. Join Baugarten to shape your empire your way!

name: Scottside
description: "Scottside" is a non-linear visual novel in the thriller genre. A small provincial town may seem quite dull. However, everything changes when you find a strange object in the forest.

name: Orb Hunter
description: In a world filled with darkness, orbs infused from darkness are spread around the world. You are an Orb Hunter and orb hunting you do. Join us in a Third-Person Dark Fantasy Action Game, and lets find gold and glory.

name: Cube Survivor
description: Cube Survivor is an engaging roguelite experience that challenges you to harness the power of your mouse and a diverse array of unique abilities in your relentless quest to protect your core from relentless enemy assaults.

name: Delta Park
description: Delta Park is a horror and exploration title with a retro style. After being attacked by a strange being and our pet “Pepa” disappears without a trace, the search will lead us to discover the twisted origin of the creature and its creator. We must find Pepa, and return home safe and sound.

name: Potter About
description: This side scrolling platformer lets you explore a beautiful, cozy home as a well-worn flower pot. Navigate through the clustered rooms and wield peculiar, plant-inspired powers on this comfy, meditative adventure.

name: Infinity Castle Dungeon
description: Infinity Castle Dungeon is a game that combines Hardcore and Roguelike. You have only one life, an infinite castle where all battles and challenges take place in real time. The castle is generated procedurally so each journey will be unique.

name: Block Breakin' Logic Downstacker
description: Block Breakin' Logic Downstacker is a puzzle game where you reveal a beautiful image hidden behind the stack of blocks using block breaking logic.

name: Ballionaire
description: BALLIONAIRE is a physics-based pachinko-builder. Find and exploit outrageous synergies. Theorycraft and bonk your way to victory. Welcome to the autobonker genre!

name: Do I Know You?
description: Do I Know You? is a very short visual novel about a man visiting his mother with dementia.

name: Phenomena Embattled
description:
From the far reaching void of space, to the very cores of planets. This is where Phenomena Embattled takes place. You are part of an alien confederation sent to earth to find the means of ending an intergalactic conflict. Humanity is caught between alien star-fleets. They must strive to keep their place in the universe. You must find the path to complete your mission.

The game is a physics based shoot 'em up. Interact with squadrons and entire fleets in a story driven world. This single player narrative focuses on action rich, rouge-like, trans-medium combat. Be it air, water, or vacuum. The medium you steer your unexplained vehicle through will determine your capabilities. And the ones of your enemies.

name: Very Scary Backrooms Game
description: You have no weapons. You have no means of defending yourself. Some will chase you, some will outsmart you. If you are in danger, run and hide.

name: Robot Detour
description: Wrap your head and wire around numerous puzzles of Robot Detour, and become the smartest and strongest robot of them all!

name: Freak Festival
description: Immerse yourself in the human resources hell of a freak show! Recruit, train and manage artists on tour. Make your way through the dangerous mysteries surrounding the circus, and make sure you don't end up at the end of your rope...

name: Sunaba
description: Sunaba is a 3D First and Third Person Singleplayer and Multiplayer Sandbox game centered on User Generated Content. Inspired by games such as LittleBigPlanet, Roblox, Minecraft and Garry's Mod, with an art style inspired by cartoons, and anime.

name: Scroll the Pain Away
description: Step into the shoes of Indigo, the owner of a small magic shop. Help your customers with a wide variety of problems!

name: Apollo Cosmic
description: Apollo Cosmic takes you on the journey of a recently unclassified mission to explore the far side of the moon. Experience the mission that was re-built in accordance with the descriptions found in historical records and unlock documents to further understand this mysterious mission.

name: Death of Marionette
description: A ruined factory that arrived to prepare for the event. I go through strange things in that place. Will they be able to get out safely?

name: Learn to Dodge
description: Improve your reaction time and dodging skills in this topdown bullet hell from Timeflier Games.

name: Star Shift Freelancers
description: In a galaxy where loyalty is tested and alliances shift like stars, Captain Max Triton and his crew find themselves embroiled in a sea of treachery. When their own government betrays them, Triton and his crew must forge their own path, or lose everything.

name: Swords and Hexes
description: Swords & Hexes is a hex-based tabletop strategy game that seamlessly merges classic board games with base building and resource management.

name: Mystery at Grand Fir Village
description: Enter a colorful town where new stories evolve every day. What clues will you find in this mystery life-sim? Will you make new friends? Be the local trouble-maker? Spend a rainy day at your treehouse?

name: Aliya's Ascent
description: Aliya’s Ascent is a story about a girl who mysteriously found herself in the middle of a boat towards an unknown land. Embark on a journey in the world of the first Legions and meet familiar faces as you unravel the tales that made the fabric of Bridgeworld. Every choice you make matters!

name: Oasis Mission
description: Assemble your fleet of levitating ships and construct bases, merging them into an ecosystem and creating production chains. Modify the equipment of buildings and ships, and unlock new technologies. A well-thought-out economic system responds to every action you take!

name: Hovermania
description: 3D puzzle driving platformer game with a global leaderboard. Find where you stand in each of the surprisingly difficult levels

name: Binary Escape
description: Binary Escape is a multiplayer horror game in which you and three other players must face terrifying monsters and solve tasks to survive. In this dark game, survival is your goal and to escape from the places where you are trapped...

name: Mirrors of Epiphany
description: Do you like laser beams? Are you a fan of mirrors? Prepare to enjoy laser beams that change direction when they hit the mirrors YOU place on the board! Play around to find a workable solution, or aim for utter perfection!

name: My Friend Aki
description: A horror-tinged puzzle and exploration game set in an abandoned mall. Improvise tools, uncover secrets, and stumble upon something strange and bright in the darkness.

name: Cosmic Coop
description: 'Cosmic Coop', an alien farming/creature collector odyssey! Lure Critterlings with captivating objects, establish harmonious ecosystems, and ward off invaders. Delve into mines, craft for your farm, and chat with quirky native creatures. More than farming – it's deep cosmic bonding.

name: Cattie
description: Cattie is a platform game with retro graphics.

name: Check and Slash
description: Check and Slash combines the action and combat of a hack-and-slash game with the movement patterns of chess pieces. Find your way through a maze of boards, slash your enemies, dodge attacks, rescue black pieces to receive upgrades, and fight against formidable opponents until you find the enemy king.

name: Star Overhead
description: Star Overhead is a short but challenging 2D platformer following a retired military chaplain turned pastor. On his deathbed, he uses his connection to music to process his journey into the great beyond.

name: Zodiac Revenger
description: Zodiac Revenger is a 2D action platformer. Took place post the Zodiac race, the 12 winners have been reward with great mystical power. They used it to spread chaos throught the peaceful land. Follow the Cat on a quest to dethrone the terror rulers, and get his own revenge on the Zodiac leader.

name: LonelyMe
description: Under the lonely moonlight, let's play chess by playing cards! Please note whether your chesses are under the shadow. Or, you will be punished! Is it offensive or defensive, is it a slap or a solution? What, the moon can still rotate? Your choice determines the fate of the chessmen and lays your end

name: The Da Vinci Cryptex
description: Are you ready to solve 50 incredible riddles to gain your freedom? Test your IQ skills by playing The Da Vinci Cryptex and find out the genius you are!

name: Nightmare Materials
description: Nightmare Materials is a Pixel Art Plattformer with Combat, Puzzles and a lot of Exploration and discovering. As a Drone you explore a lost and mysterious World.

name: Gnarly Hike
description: Gnarly Hike is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore an eerie forest in a slow-paced, atmospheric world combining beautiful and horrifying scenery along with the constant fear of being hunted, and enjoy a genuinely terrifying experience. Uncover secrets, expel spirits and ...stay alive!

name: Lonely Space
description: Lonely space is an old-fashioned sci-fi immersive sim game. You find yourself awakened from hibernetic sleep in the docking bay of the Cassiopeia space station. All your crew gone long time ago. You have to resque them and find out what's going on on the station.

name: Bug Ball
description: Bug Ball is a wacky football (soccer) game where you play as little bugs.

name: Turbo Champ
description: Turbo Champ is a fast-paced, arcade racing game. Unlock unique cars in the single-player campaign, or play online and locally with your friends. Will you be the world's next Turbo Champ?

name: Project Breakout
description: Project Breakout is a sandbox prison escape game, where you and up to three friends are put into a secured facility. Explore the area, train to improve your attributes and gather items, to craft tools that are necessary for your escape!

name: Ruiga Pirates

name: Isolation One
description: Exciting action with puzzle elements and an interesting plot, which takes place on the huge spaceship Transporter P18. In this game, players will encounter an incredible mixture of science fiction and horror. Immerse yourself in a dark world where t you need to survive at any cost.

name: An Aisling
description: An Aisling is an adventure game focused on exploration, story, and character. Make friends or enemies as you try to uncover why people are dissappearing on the island of Rashinmore.

name: Happy Fall
description:
Join a cute family of Jelly and Ice Cream characters on an exciting journey. Drop safely between the platforms to fall down deeper and deeper.

You still have to keep everyone safe from the mean flies, but this time you have a huge range of power ups to help you fight back. Collect all the characters by picking up the coins in the game, or you can use your coins to build up the power ups!

name: Fire Emblem: Drums of War
description:
A familiar sun set over foreign soil. The Aulestri pulled back, leaving swathes of their own behind, their fierce legions left broken against the rag-tag militias of the Federal Guard.
It wasn’t enough. It would never be enough. Tomorrow, the legions would resume the attack; rested, reinforced, against starving, demoralised and desperate conscripts. Tomorrow, the Guard would break…

FE: Drums of War is a full campaign total conversion hack, that implements a wide array of custom graphics, QoL patches and unique objectives, while still operating within the non-SkillSys GBAFE framework. It features 22 chapters, a cast of 46 playable characters and over 50 complete support chains, as well as a number of non-essential secrets. It aims to tell a nuanced, grounded story, without reverting to tired cynicism; no matter how dark the hour, it is strength to be found in each other, and a new day will always come.

In gameplay, emphasis is placed on decisive, aggressive play to deal with tight, hard-hitting enemy formations that will overwhelm passive play and outflank lowmanning. It is probably closest in difficulty to Radiant Dawn’s Normal mode, or the Hard/Classic setting of more recent titles, and is designed to be ironman-friendly with clear signposting, a tough lord, and a constant stream of available recruits. An easier campaign with Casual Mode implementation is planned for a future release.

name: Bloody Harry
description:
Shoot and smash your way through hordes of vegetable zombies!

Join vegan cook "Bloody Harry" on his hunt for vegetable zombie creatures!

Each level is a new challenge with an increasing amount of enemies. Survive and reach the exit! Unlock and upgrade 15 different zombie bursting weapons and plow your way through an endless amount of levels offering new surprises and dangers around each corner.

While you fight your way through the hordes of foul creatures, you'll eventually climb the career ladder in the global highscore list.

You'll also run into giant boss-zombies which may eat all your ammo before they finally make a return as harmless dessert. Sounds tasty you say? It is!

my eyes deceive is a first-person psychological horror experience set in a basement, or shelter, if you will. Set over the course of roughly a week, you play as a young girl who has been living there all her life.

The outside world is infected with a deadly disease. Society is in chaos. Fortunately, your papa is protecting you by keeping you in his shelter. He's very insistent on you taking your disease-preventive pills every day. Why do the pills make you tired? When will you be able to leave? Can we be deceived by our own perception?

It should take you around 30 minutes to finish the whole set, and the maps get progressively longer and tougher as you go on. The map contains custom weapons, namely an auto rifle which replaces the pistol, and an upgraded chaingun. Plasma marines replace the wimpy Former Humans, with sprites done by @Tango.

name: Eggconsole Thexder PC-8801mkIISR
description:
When discussing retro robot-themed games, one masterpiece that always comes to mind is 'THEXDER'. This action-shooting game was released in 1985.

The player takes control of the hyper dual-armor "THEXDER," which can transform into both robot and fighter forms, and throws himself into the battle to destroy the magnetic field generator of the asteroid Nediam. The game is played in side-view and consists of 16 stages (plus 16 back stages).

In the battle against the enemy, you can use either the robot form, which has a tracking laser but inferior mobility, or the fighter form, which can only attack in the direction you are going but has superior mobility, depending on the situation. Barriers are also available, but if they are used too often, they will run out of energy, so they should be used only when the situation calls for it! You should use them only when you need them.

The game is based on the life system with no save function, so you only have one shot each time you play! The difficulty level of the game is high, so if you are good at it, please give it a try.

This is a masterpiece that has been carefully crafted with a world view, excellent mecha design, and smooth animation during transformation, not to mention the addictive nature that makes you want to play it over and over again despite its difficulty.
