description: Become the largest food provider in history in Agritopia! Cultivate, unlock, and enhance your agricultural techniques to ensure a permanent food production to sustain the big cities, all while tackling the challenge of progressing through time and reaching the distant future's goal.

name: Lost For Swords
description: Lost For Swords is a Roguelike Deckbuilder, where the cards in your deck shape the rooms you’re exploring. Make your way up the tower, equip weapons and armor, cast spells and scrolls, activate auras, collect loot and defeat monsters in tactical turn-based combat.

name: Nine Errand
description: The protagonist, Nine, embarks on his first errand at the request of Alice. With his unique ability, Nine can resurrect no matter how many times he dies. Let's keep pushing forward without giving up, even in the face of death. Otherwise, you might incur the wrath of your master, Alice.

name: Aim in Space
description: A fantastic space game to train reaction and aiming skills. Don't let the aliens destroy your base!

name: Deadlocked
description: Deadlocked is an adrenaline-packed Top-Down shooter where you'll confront hordes of relentless robotic foes. Unleash futuristic weapons, master strategic combat, and prove your mettle against the mechanical onslaught. Can you outmanoeuvre and overpower the relentless enemy threat?

name: Citres
description: Explore Citres, a unique blend of city-building & puzzle gameplay! Place Tetris-shaped buildings, merge them into advanced structures, and grow your population. Embrace strategy in a vibrant, low-poly world.

name: Quirk! Origins: A Jester's Tale
description: Jesters want nothing more than to make people laugh and one day be accepted in a Court. Help Jester piece together an awesome show of tricks and pranks in hopes of wooing the four royals of Playcardia. Will Jester achieve the heights of his dreams, or will his jokes simply fall flat?

name: Assault Wing
description: Assault Wing is a free 2D side scrolling retro PvP shooter. You will choose your ship, special weapon and ship modification. The arenas are physics based with destructible terrain. See who of your friends is best with the global ranking system.

name: Bio Block
description: All new puzzle expereince!

name: Colors and their Meanings
description: Discover how colors can influence your emotions and decisions, and learn how to use them creatively to feel better and achieve your goals. Join this exciting adventure!

name: WWII Tanks Battle: World War 2 Heroes Troopers Machines Sim
description: Are you up for the challenge? Dive into the heart of World War II and prove your tank commander skills in this epic gaming experience!

name: Razor Wire
description: Take down zombies with a rope!

name: Blasphemous + Blasphemous 2 Bundle
description: The Miracle summons you Sinner! This bundle includes both of the indie smash hits Blasphemous 1 and 2. So enter the world of Blasphemous and get to smiting.

name: War is Hare
description: A two-player tactical game for Playdate

name: Dream Celestial Body
description: Astronauts want to go home, begin fantasy adventure.

name: Kungfu
description: Kungfu is a simple strategic martial arts game.Enjoy it.

name: Iggy & Java
description: Iggy & Java is a light-hearted puzzle game. You will accompany the lovable characters "Iggy" and "Java" on their journey through various scenarios and rich puzzles.

name: Traversion
description: Introducing Traversion, a movement-based arcade platformer with a focus on rocket jumping, strafing, and grappling to navigate levels as efficiently as possible. Enjoy a minimalist, skill-based experience where the primary goal is to achieve faster completion times and hone your senses.

name: Alstroemeria
description: It's a side-view scroll shooter. It's a game in which you control your own aircraft and shoot down enemy aircraft. There are 21 different types of weapons to attack, and if you accumulate 3 gauges on the UI, each selected weapon will be available for a certain amount of time.

name: Whale Game Online
description: Can You Make a Whale?It's a delightful game where you connect cute sea creatures to make them grow bigger.Single Player and Multiplayer Modes!There are both a single-player mode and a multiplayer mode for competing with friends and rivals from around the world.

name: LaserPoint
description: The turn-based strategy game that requires you to use building elements to hit all the laserpoints on each level with lasertrons! In this game, you'll encounter a variety of lasertrons that can be reflected, refracted, decomposed into a spectrum of lasertrons, or change colors.

name: Dobro Love Fantasy Quest
description: A charming community passion-project, this visual novel turned life-sim hybrid features funny meme dogs and a coming of age story. Play as a simple dobro in a big city that parodies life in the modern world. Will you find true love or endless riches?

name: Temple Guy: Quest for Chest
description: A chest full of diamonds awaits you on top of the Temple of Despair! Challenge yourself and climb the temple in this 2d-precision platformer!

name: Multiplayer Obby
description: Multiplayer Obby - A Fun Obstacle Course Race Party Game. Make your way across moving platforms, jump pads, rotating beams and bridges that suddenly open, and more. The first player to pick up the trophy is the winner!

name: Prophan Escape
description: In Prophan Escape you have to get five coper statues which are in random places around a labirynth to complete each level, it's that simple... Oh, yeah, there are also two antropomorphic weird cubes with realistic extremities that want to kill you, so you will have to avoid that weird guys.

name: Dreamland
description: Dreamland is a world full of imagination and adventure, waiting for you to explore and discover. Join us and embark on your adventure!

name: Lost Pixel
description: Prepare to embark on an extraordinary journey like no other in Lost Pixel. You won't be stepping into the shoes of a traditional hero – instead, you'll take on the role of a lone, wandering pixel in a digital realm.

name: Anonymous Hunting Simulator
description: Anonymous Hunting Simulator is a dynamic first-person shooter. Your task is to explore the location and collect ten masks to complete the level.

name: Doashime
description: Dive into the chain boarding game "Doashime: Close the Door!" and fill the train with cute animals. While avoiding being spotted by station staff, chain same-colored animals for points, and ensure they board. Score until the last second and ascend to the top of the global rankings.

name: Emoji Sport
description: The soybean man sports meet has started, and you can manipulate your soybean man to compete and use different techniques to achieve different best results in the competition.

name: Sealchain
description: The "Sealchain" is a roguelite game where items can be connected to each other to create chain reactions. In this crumbling world, you will play as a medium, using the power of curse seals to cleanse the world of post-apocalyptic evil spirits.

name: SPGP Super Polygon Grand Prix
description: Ultra fast Retro Style Racing.

name: The Gnorp Apologue
description: (the) Gnorp Apologue is the journey of the gnorps as you guide them towards their goal of delightfully excessive wealth accumulation.

name: Call of Dookie
description: Imagine you went to the crapper, and emerged an hour later to a monster apocalypse! Retro first-person shooter action inspired by 90's classics! Old-school local deathmatch & co-op for up to 4 players!

name: Elon's Last Chance
description: Elon's Last Chance is a time management simulator with a running astronaut under your control. Complete tasks that appear gradually within the timer. Try to hold out as long as possible, because if any of the timers expires, the game will be over.

name: Kumi-Daiko Beatoff
description: Whip and whack in the wildest couch multiplayer brawl! Put a mask on, get some friends over and unleash drum-whirling chaos together. May the nimblest of thumbs win!

name: Intravenous 2: Mercenarism
description: Playing as Gideon, a cold-hearted mercenary willing to kill for money without any moral principles, you'll have tactical freedom with a wide variety of weapons and special gadgets to complete your mission in the prologue of Intravenous 2.

name: Catast
description: This game is a puzzle game in which you destroy blocks with simple controls! Find a route to destroy many blocks at once and enjoy the pleasure of destroying them all at once!

name: Navigating the Labyrinth
description: Navigating the Labyrinth is a classic first-person party-based dungeon crawler RPG with grid-based movement and turn-based combat. Discover the secrets and riches of the labyrinths, and save your dying city.

name: Journey to the West
description: A classic nostalgic side scroll game!

name: VRSO: Bare Knuckle Fighting
description: VRSO: Bare Knuckle Fighting set in authentic abandoned arenas. Face off against 16 unique fighters in the pinnacle of VR sports. Hone your skills in detailed training, then challenge players worldwide. Experience cutting-edge movement in every punch and dodge. Become the ultimate VRSO champion!

name: Stacks: Jungle!
description: Stacks: Jungle! is an engaging adventure card game set in the lush heart of the jungle. Unlock new cards with booster packs, combine them to uncover craft recipes, build amazing structures, venture into uncharted territories, make new friends, discover hidden treasures, and so much more!

name: Merge ETO
description: It is a physics puzzle in which identical ETOs are merged together to transform them into the next ETO. Increase your combo count by successive merges, update your high score, and compete with the world on the Steam Leaderboard!

name: Cat Legend
description: The countless backyard gardens managed by Meow were simultaneously invaded by Mutant Lords. The situation was urgent, and the lively and kind-hearted Hakimi rushed out to defeat the Mutant Invaders, counterattack the Mutant Lords, and end the Source of Mutation.

name: M City
description: A crazy and strange town, filled with mysterious events. A hero with multiple personality disorders. Laughter, tears and madness!

name: Risiko Chess
description: Do you want to play chess? Monopoly? Risk? Or perhaps you want to play a wargame? Here you'll find all of that in one, wild game.

name: Noumisou Journey
description: A boy, is killed by a killer but resurrected on Halloween. But his brain had been stolen. Confront traps and monsters. Interact with strange inhabitants, solve puzzles, and get your brain back. Dying Game & comical horror. death scene collection feature available. pixel-art exploration adventure.

name: Fighting for Singleship: I am Chased by a Bunch of Women But I Just Want to Play Video Games
description: You relish indoor life, gaming, but now, a challenging twist: every woman adores you. Witness the story unfold. Conquer challenging waves of unhinged admirers, aiming to remain unmarried. Climb the leaderboard against your friends, proving your supremacy.

name: Galactic Heroes: Rise of the Black Alliance
description: Embark on a perilous journey as Max, the space ranger, to hunt down the leaders of the Black Alliance. Pilot different spacecraft, dodge asteroids, battle enemies, and confront ruthless leaders. Become a true hero of space!

name: K2: Digital Edition
description: Easy to play, hard to survive. Rush to the summit before weather breaks or set up camps and prepare to push later. Choose the right cards for the right moment. Play turn based strategy with friends, AI or in single player mode. Popular board game adaptation consulted with real K2 climbers.

name: Elixirs
description: Immerse yourself in this mental arithmetic roguelike in which you play as a little alchemist. Multiply, subtract, add to make the right potions and complete as many orders as possible!

name: Detective Fantasia: Excalimurder
description: A dead orphan has been found slashed next to Excalibur... Explore the orphanage to gather clues and uncover the truth in this colorful Game Boy-inspired mystery game, Detective Fantasia: Excalimurder!

name: Trading Simulator
description: Build your financial empire in Trading Simulator by strategically investing in businesses, navigating a dynamic market, and using realistic trading mechanics. Are you ready to turn your financial dreams into reality?

name: 3DC
description: 3DC is a graphic adventure that teaches children from 8 to 12 years old what depression is.

name: Paranormal Precinct: Last Copy of '99
description: Classic survival horror rogue-like from the PSX-era. Explore a fully fleshed-out city, solve casefiles and kill monstrosities. Gather the cash to scout new recruits, upgrade your precinct, and load up the armory. Survive till retirement day.

name: Run and Fire
description: Run and Fire is a 2D platformer with shooter elements in which you have to fight enemies.

name: Tinkerlands: A Shipwrecked Adventure
description: Tinkerlands: A Shipwrecked Adventure is your portal to the expansive world of Tinkerlands. Uncover the story of the first survivors on these mystical and fantastical islands. Explore the breathtaking archipelago, craft essential tools, build your settlement, and strive to survive!

name: The Light of the Darkness: Origins
description:
A captivating dark fantasy action RPG featuring rich-visual biomes, an intriguing narrative, and a challenging Souls-like combat.
Players experience unique and epic aerial combats and exploration with a winged protagonist and absorb essence from others to grab their essence and natures. While doing so, they collect items that help to uncover a dense lore in this 8-hour adventure in the 'Lands of Oblivion, a perfect warm-up for players craving for short metroidvania/souls-like games before diving into heavier titles.

name: Forsisted: The Sacred Souls
description: Forsisted is a horror game, a mission to find an object in an abandoned mansion that is known to be cursed.

name: StarL2
description: Enjoy StarL2 a lovely fresh take on Match 3 games! A huge and colorful game with numerous levels of varying complexity. You must demolish tiles. You may build rows or lines of three by swapping adjacent stones. Collect more than three gems to unlock further goods.

name: Last Dissent: Lockdown
description:
Wake up. Drink Coffee. Save the World. Repeat.
Lockdown in Effect. Stay Inside.

Atmospheric Abrasive Dystopian Mystery Inspired by Phillip K. Dick and The Stanford Prison Experiment.

name: Cosmic Gunslinger: Alien Outlaws
description: Cosmic Gunslinger: Alien Outlaws is a pulse-pounding single-player video game where you, as the gunslinger cowboy Cosmo, and your trusty canine companion, must survive relentless waves of Aliens. Upgrade your weapons, collect crucial items. Can you outdraw and outlast the alien threat?

name: King Wizard, of the Forest Kingdom
description: A captivating blend of deckbuilding roguelike and tower defense genres. Craft your powerful deck, embark on a grand adventure through the Forest Kingdom, and wage epic battles against relentless enemy hordes. Are you ready to claim your throne in this unique fusion of cards and towers?

name: Magret & FaceDeBouc
description: The pilot episode of a likely long series of police investigations. Take control of an unlikely duo consisting of Inspector Magret, a refined duck and Inspector FaceDeBouc a devilishly contrasting goat. Help them solve the mystery of the murder of Mr. Couane, a local merchant found dead in the city.

name: The Adventures of The Black Hawk
description: Hide behind your mask so they won’t discover your true identity, and grab your sword to face the tyranny of the nobility in the days before the French Revolution in this funny point-and-click adventure, following the path of the classics of the 90s… thirty years later!

name: Chinese Ancient Poetry Matching Game
description: This game is a classic tile-matching game. Players can match tiles by clicking on the corresponding tiles in the order of Chinese ancient poetry, lyrics, and prose to pass levels. Through this game, players can experience the charm of traditional Chinese culture.

name: Survial
description: This is a classic RPG game.

name: Contorted
description: Contorted is a exploration/gameplay focused horror game, where you decend down seemingly endless amount of mysterious wells to find someone, only to find out you're neither alone or safe

name: Project I
description: Project I is an action-adventure game that follows the protagonist's journey to escape from an unknown laboratory and regain who he is. Defeat the enemies and escape from the lab.

name: Ashes O
description: Hurry up, the world stops in 5 minutes! Gain 100 levels in one swing of your sword and place your stat points in action to face the end of the world. A “Fast RPG” tinged with action and exploration with unique gameplay!

name: Potato Sack Racing Simulator 2024
description: I know what you are thinking, and yes, this game does feature the ability to fight grandparents, mugs, speakers and of course dirty tissues... Wait, this is a game about Potato Sack Racing? Umm.. Yeah there are like 4 levels about Potato Sack Racing out of the 17 levels... Phew, we almost forgot to make it have something to do with Potato Sack Racing! But now trust me bro, this game is the BEST Potato Sack Racing game to have ever been made! At least, from what we could find.. Yeah this is actually the first and only Potato Sack Racing game, it’s almost like it’s not a good idea to make a game about Potato Sack Racing, it’s pretty fun to say Potato Sack Racing. Potatooooo sack racingggggg!!!!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate - Halloween 5
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Halloween
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: 100 Tokyo Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Tokyo Cats.

name: Brawlhalla: BCX 2023 Pack
description: Be a part of the eighth annual Brawlhalla World Championship with the BCX 2023 Pack! This limited time pack contains 300 Mammoth Coins, the BCX 2023 Avatar and an exclusive Mammoth Gentle-fan Sidekick. A must-have for followers of Brawlhalla esports!

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Nicotero Leatherface
description: From the mind of legendary special make-up effects creator, producer, and director Greg Nicotero, comes this twisted new Leatherface created exclusively for The Texas Chain Saw Massacre.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Digital Splatter Weapon Skin Set
description: Take the perfect cover with the Digital Splatter Weapon Skin Set for Security and paint the battlegrounds with your personal touch. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Road Stomp
description: Sin descripción

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Click or Treat
description: The "Click or Treat" DLC serves as an expansion to the base game, introducing a new island within the HUB area. This island will feature portals leading to three spooky-themed levels, each with a unique gameplay focus.

name: Space Race
description: Sin descripción

name: Trepang2: Survival Mode
description: Test your ultimate badass skills with the Trepang2 Survival Mode DLC.

name: Elven Assassin: Rise of Darkness
description: Step into a world shrouded in darkness and take up your bow as you face off against an army of the Risen, from Skeletons to Undead Dragons. With the gloomy atmosphere and intense gameplay, prepare to test your archery skills as you defend the town on three new maps. Are you ready to join the battle?

name: Revolve A
description:
Revolve A is a fast-paced one-button game.

You control an arrow that is constantly moving and spinning around. Press a button to move in the direction which the arrow is currently facing. Enemies randomly appear from the sides of the screen and generate links between themselves. By crossing any of the links you score points and destroy all the network of this link.

The game is over when you hit any of the enemies.

name: Session: Skate Sim - Abandoned Mall
description: The skatepark skateboarders have been dreaming of. Check out the Abandoned Mall and find all the new spots where you can perform your best tricks.

name: Spin Rhythm XD: Monstercat
description: A hand-picked collection of 10 classic Monstercat tunes including nostalgic beats and some hidden gems.

name: Otherworld Legends: Ourania
description:
Hero Ourania
Drifts from the perennially snowbound steppes ever accompany the ethereally graceful Ourania, sweeping sin from every corner of the world and delivering her blessings in their stead. Doted upon by the spirits of her animistic ancestors, the fledgeling shamaness swirls and glissades through the immaculate landscape with unfettered carefreeness, her eyes bright as a sky after rain and her elfin form brimming with numinous potential.
[h3]Mark of Shamaness:[/h3]
Your skills and normal attacks apply a stacking Mark of Shamaness on enemies. Once the Mark has reached 8 stacks, your next normal attack will cause it to detonate, dealing damage.
You can absorb Mark of Shamaness from enemies by slaying them or holding down dodge, converting the Marks into Shamanic Mana. Once your Shamanic Mana is full, you gain the ability to transform into the Whisper of Spirit by holding down dodge.
[h3]Whisper of Spirit:[/h3]
You take on the form of a windborne plume that can freely traverse the environment, dealing high damage to enemies in your path and slowing them. Once the form ends, dodge will be unusable for a time.

name: Otherworld Legends: Synthia
description:
Hero Synthia
A cybernetically augmented and neurally conditioned transhuman, Synthia is able to bring to bear her hulking arsenal of Exoframe to sow carnage among enemies with terrifying ease.
Using exoframe builds up Heat. Upon reaching a threshold, you enter an Overheat state with heightened attack speed and movement speed, as well as a chance to burn enemies with your normal attack.
An actively-firing exoframe can be manually halted and cooled down by holding down its corresponding skill button.
If allowed to peak, excess Heat will trigger an Overload, rendering you unable to perform any action for a time in addition to initiating an extended cooldown on all skills.

name: Otherworld Legends: Sinistar Ruthven
description:
Skin for Ruthven : Sinistar Ruthven
For seven days and nights, Uriel Longinus, the Ferrum Daemonum, held his ground against the hundred thousand heavenly hosts who would compel his arraignment following his defiance of the Dictum Divinas. Ultimately battered and spent, Uriel was forced to abscond to the realm of man. Consciousness desperately waning, Uriel tethered his primordial animus to the form of a passing novitiate sword-brother - Ruthven - and over the course of the following days and years, clandestinely aided the latter in the honing of his swordcraft, intending to subjugate his mortal corpus once his own faculties were redeemed.
As Ruthven's mettle was whetted to a fine point, so too undeniably brilliant did its glint reflect among the rank and file of his House. Yet, on one fateful day where a sparring duel was to be arranged, Ruthven, in a moment of hubris, unleashed a strike fortified by livid Daemonic energy, instantly damning him as an irredeemable traitor to be hunted for all time. Hopeless and outnumbered against his former kin, Ruthven made one final appeal to Uriel, who answered by manifesting into being - and rebuking their beleaguering troupe of would-be executioners with ruthless efficiency - an act that was apparent in its message to the Celestial Realm. As celestial champions, one after another, set themselves to tracking down the revived Ferrum Daemonum and his human servitor to enforce their demise, the Daemonic duo steel themselves for a stand to the death... for a chance to live.

name: Otherworld Legends: Atomic Girl
description:
Skin for Anibella : Atomic Girl
Beneath the opulent neon-baptized countenance of Arcarune - the megapolitan hub of technological wonders - a syndicate of institutional malefactors scuttle to enact their Machiavellian machinations, while a coalition of the city's excelsiors - Atomic Girl and her companions - rise to meet them.
Time and time again, Anibella confides in not just her prodigious technological innovations and nonpareil rocket-saddled jockeying skills, but also the indefatigable teamwork of her fellow vigilantes to foil the sinister schemes of Arcarune's criminal underbelly.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - Official Tram Extension
description: This DLC gives you access to your own trams that you can operate, buy, and customize. Tram routes become available for you to plan and create. Additionally, there are also new story missions and driving events.

name: Plant Therapy: Cat Art Pack
description: This Plant Therapy Cat Art Pack is full of over 30 new cat related items to take your game to level cat-tastic!

name: Saints Row: Hexy Halloween Free Cosmetic Pack
description: Who says Saints can't be sinners? Stalk (or fly) the streets of Santo Ileso with this huge collection of devilish Halloween cosmetics.

name: Ninja
description: Prepare for an intense clash of strategy in Ninja Empires, an online real-time strategy game that combines the essence of Clash with the stealthy world of ninjas!

name: Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 5
description: "Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles with our latest DLC - Expansion Pack 5!

description: "Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles with our latest DLC - Expansion Pack 4!

description: "Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles with our latest DLC - Expansion Pack 3!

name: Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
description: "Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles with our latest DLC - Expansion Pack 2!

name: Space Engineers: Anniversary Pack
description: Space Engineers: Anniversary Pack includes 3 exclusive suit skins: Party Tuxedo Skin, Ghost Skin, and Veteran Skin.

name: Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
description: "Immerse yourself in the enchanting world of Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles with our latest DLC - Expansion Pack 1!

name: VRC Pro: Bashing & Crawling Car & Track Pack
description: The VRC Pro Bashing & Crawling pack is the ultimate pack for bashers and crashers. The Basher & Crawler pack contains 2 special basher tracks: Fear Farm and C-Netic, and the Basher and Carwler chassis and components. Go anywhere you want, in any direction. Take jumps from any side. Just have fun!

name: VRC Pro: Dirt Pack 3
description: VRC Pro: Dirt Course Pack 3 containing Short course 2, Long course 3, and the Drift course 4. Easy to run, hard to perform!

name: VRC Pro: Welkom Arena Lay-out 3-4-5-6 Track Pack 4
description: The Welkom Arena, home of the 2018 IFMAR Worlds 1:10 and 1:12 electric. Located in Welkom South Africa, the Welkom Arena is one of the biggest indoor facilities in the world and allows even for nitro racing as it uses a high grip asphalt surface! This pack contains 4 extra Welkom Arena tracks!

name: VRC Pro: Welkom Arena 2018 Worlds Track Pack 2
description: The Welkom Arena, home of the 2018 IFMAR Worlds 1:10 and 1:12 electric. Located in Welkom South Africa, the Welkom Arena is one of the biggest indoor facilities in the world and allows even for nitro racing! This track pack contains the 1:10 ISTC Worlds and the 1:12 sportscars Worlds lay-out.

name: VRC Pro: Xtreme Oval Track Pack 3
description: Contains 3 spectacular oval lay-outs starting with Xtreme Bo1 (long) and MO1 (medium). The Xtreme track is designed and developed by VRC and contains a unique crossing. The short oval track XTR OT3 will be automatically added to this pack when it becomes available!

name: Romans: Age of Caesar - Starter Pack
description: The Steam Starter Pack is perfect for new players looking to kick start their Roman domination in Romans Age Of Caesar.

name: Waven: Welcome Pack
description: You've been chosen by the goddess Cra, the deity of judgment who guides the World of Twelve's archers with a keen eye. She's decided to offer her blessing, in the form of a new Welcome Pack to help guide you in your Waven adventure!

name: OMSI 2: Agora Bus Family Citybus Vol. 2
description: Immerse yourself in an unrivalled driving experience and climb aboard and explore the city with the OMSI 2 Add-on Agora Bus Family Citybus Vol. 2.

name: DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue: Deluxe Character Pack
description: The DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue: Deluxe Character Pack is loaded with exclusive characters and content for the most rockin' DreamWorks Trolls Remix Rescue experience!

name: To The Star
description: Be a crow and break the code in the witch's hut and escape!

name: Empire: Galaxy Burning
description: A shoot-em-up game (loosely) inspired by the likes of Crimson Clover, Mushihimesama and R-Type, battling against an ancient superweapon to save both the galaxy and a close friend!

name: Hanabi
description: Connect vertical, horizontal, curved, and crisscross ropes well,Burn the ropes to ignite the fireworks balls!Let's set off beautiful fireworks!

name: 3D Puzzle: Kingdom in Dark
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Smite x RuneScape Premium Bundle
description: Smite x RuneScape continues with this epic crossover bundle, featuring Sandwich Lady Amaterasu and Black Armor Bellona. Plus get 2 RuneScape chest rolls! Available for a limited time - don't miss out on this great bundle!

name: Project Stocks: Multiplayer
description: Play project stocks with others!
